abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column highlights Pernod Ricard's campaign for its Absolut vodka, commemorating 30 years of brand's efforts to reach gay community.
snippet: The vodka’s new campaign commemorates its efforts to reach American consumers who are gay, efforts which began in 1981 with magazine ads.
lead_paragraph: The vodka’s new campaign commemorates its efforts to reach American consumers who are gay, efforts which began in 1981 with magazine ads.

headline.main: Absolut Celebrates Its 30 Years of Marketing to Gay Consumers
headline.print_headline: Absolut Celebrates Its 30 Years of Marketing to Gay Consumers
headline.seo: Absolut Heralds Its Marketing to Gay Consumers
